attributes.action: No law change on vape mods and e-liquid
attributes.additional_details: We as a vaping community do not see why we should be restricted to a certain size bottle of e-liquid when a regular smoker can walk into a shop and buy an unlimited amount of cigarettes which have been proven to cause cance. There are no known health risks to vaping. But it is proven to be a safer alternative to smoking normal cigarettes. We hereby ask you as the government to put a stop to this law.
attributes.background: No law change on what mods you buy and what strength and size e-liquid you can buy.
